  • Constructor Details

    • PersistenceFactory

      public PersistenceFactory(String gameDataFolderPath)

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save(Game game)
      Save a game in the gameDataFolderPath. If a game with the same name is already saved update the save with the new one and delete the old save logs the result of the save operation
      Parameters:
      game - the game to save

    • load

      public Future<HashSet<Game>> load()
      Load all the game saves in the gameDataFolderPath. If a gameSave is expired, delete it logs the result of the load operation
      Returns:
      a Future linking to the result of the parallel execution of the method; when the method is done, the Future will contain the non-expired loaded games

    • delete

      public void delete(String gameName)
      Delete a gameSave file contained in the gameDataFolderPath that has the same name as the gameName
      Parameters:
      gameName - the name of the game to delete

    • eraseAllSaves

      public void eraseAllSaves()
      delete all the gameSave files in the gameDataFolderPath
